title: Test
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Sales volume in thousand liters, with a total of 10 data points.
Overall Sales volume in thousand liters has decreased over the Year.
Sales volume in thousand liters is roughly constant from 2009 to 2013, slightly decreasing from 2013 to 2015, and lastly slightly increasing from 2015 to 2018.
The steepest decrease occurs in between the Year 2013 and 2014.
Max Sales volume in thousand liters about 442961.0 was recorded at Year 2010
Min Sales volume in thousand liters about 258484.0 was recorded at Year 2016
This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Sales volume in thousand liters, with a total of 10 data points. The chart has 4 significant trends.
The longest trend is slightly decreasing which exists from 2013 to 2016.
On the other hand, the next significant trend is moderately decreasing which exists from 2009 to 2012.
Contrarily, the next significant trend is extremely increasing which exists from 2016 to 2018.
In a similar manner, the next significant trend is extremely increasing which exists from 2012 to 2013.
